rows.label: soul21_P0101
rows.name:
I'm in the zone. Let's close in
 and clean up!

rows.label: soul21_P0102
rows.name:
They're open!
 Use melee attacks!

rows.label: soul21_P0103
rows.name:
Let's move in and take
 'em out. Who's with me?

rows.label: soul21_P0201
rows.name: Open fire and don't let up!

rows.label: soul21_P0202
rows.name:
Come on, make some
 noise! Get buffed!

rows.label: soul21_P0203
rows.name:
Weaken 'em up front and
 improvise from there!

rows.label: soul21_P0301
rows.name: Melee attacks! Start off strong!

rows.label: soul21_P0302
rows.name: Rapid fire! Don't let up!

rows.label: soul21_P0303
rows.name:
Your next move should
 be an aura!

rows.label: soul21_P0401
rows.name:
We need to keep our
 wounds healed!

rows.label: soul21_P0402
rows.name:
It's just a scratch...
 Buff up and press on!

rows.label: soul21_P0403
rows.name:
Buff up and get that
 adrenaline flowing!

rows.label: soul21_P0501
rows.name: Not good... Patch me up!

rows.label: soul21_P0502
rows.name:
I need healing! You can't
 afford to lose me!

rows.label: soul21_P0503
rows.name:
Stay tough and we'll
 get through this.

rows.label: soul21_P0601
rows.name:
You must avenge me...
 Hit 'em with all you've got...

rows.label: soul21_P0602
rows.name:
Keep firing! Don't make
 me die for...nothing...

rows.label: soul21_P0603
rows.name:
Let me see your aura
 shine...before I go...

rows.label: soul21_P0701
rows.name:
Nice hit.
 Let's see another one!

rows.label: soul21_P0702
rows.name:
Good! Now start shooting
 and don't stop!

rows.label: soul21_P0703
rows.name:
Take a break from attacking
 to weaken it!

rows.label: soul21_P0801
rows.name:
That's part of it! Now move in
 and shut 'em down!

rows.label: soul21_P0802
rows.name:
They're flustered...
 Knock them over with gunfire!

rows.label: soul21_P0803
rows.name:
Cripple them! Don't let
 this chance slip away!

rows.label: soul21_P0901
rows.name:
I think we've worn it down.
 Keep shooting!

rows.label: soul21_P0902
rows.name:
Pile on the buffs so we can
 take down this giant!

rows.label: soul21_P0903
rows.name:
This is pointless.
 We need Overclock!

rows.label: soul21_P1001
rows.name:
Did that work?
 Then move in and strike!

rows.label: soul21_P1002
rows.name:
It worked!
 Now gun 'em down!

rows.label: soul21_P1003
rows.name:
Excellent! Now's our
 chance to weaken them!

rows.label: soul21_P1101
rows.name:
Prepare your auras!
 Be ready for anything!

rows.label: soul21_P1102
rows.name: Activate another aura!

rows.label: soul21_P1103
rows.name: Boost morale with a buff!

rows.label: soul21_P1201
rows.name:
Overclock! Let's see
 some teamwork!

rows.label: soul21_P1202
rows.name: Overclock! On me!

rows.label: soul21_P1203
rows.name:
I'm using Overclock!
 Let's see your best aura!

rows.label: soul21_C0101
rows.name:
Don't wait for the next hostile.
 Bring the fight to them!

rows.label: soul21_C0102
rows.name:
There's more!
 Attack at range until it's safe!

rows.label: soul21_C0103
rows.name:
Don't get cocky.
 Tighten up those defenses!

rows.label: soul21_C0201
rows.name:
They can't hit me!
 Try an aura now!

rows.label: soul21_C0202
rows.name:
I'm untouchable.
 Buff us up and help me out!

rows.label: soul21_C0203
rows.name:
They're confused.
 Attack at range - now!

rows.label: soul21_C0301
rows.name:
I'm on fire now!
 Break out the melee attacks!

rows.label: soul21_C0302
rows.name: Keep firing! Let's ride this out!

rows.label: soul21_C0303
rows.name:
Ha! This is your chance!
 Get up close and personal!

rows.label: soul21_C0401
rows.name:
Forget the weather.
 Buff up and fight on!

rows.label: soul21_C0402
rows.name:
Use an aura to turn this
 weather to our advantage!

rows.label: soul21_C0403
rows.name:
Should we weaken the enemy
 until this weather passes?

rows.label: soul21_C0501
rows.name:
Come on, keep up!
 Or do you need some help?

rows.label: soul21_C0502
rows.name:
I can hold this position.
 Just buff me up!

rows.label: soul21_C0503
rows.name:
The enemy is confused!
 Use Overclock now!

rows.label: soul21_C0601
rows.name:
Nice timing. Now get
 back in there, soldier!

rows.label: soul21_C0602
rows.name:
Wh-what are you doing?
 Keep shooting!

rows.label: soul21_C0603
rows.name:
Thanks. Now don't forget
 to use an aura!

rows.label: soul21_C0701
rows.name:
Buff up. We need
 a clean slate!

rows.label: soul21_C0702
rows.name:
Great. But we still
 need more power!

rows.label: soul21_C0703
rows.name:
Thanks! Don't forget to
 protect yourself with an aura!

rows.label: soul21_C0801
rows.name:
I'm still in this. Concentrate
 your melee attacks!

rows.label: soul21_C0802
rows.name: This'll heal. Don't stop firing!

rows.label: soul21_C0803
rows.name:
Get yourself buffed up and
 charge back in there!

rows.label: soul21_C0901
rows.name:
I have the high ground.
 Firing from above!

rows.label: soul21_C0902
rows.name:
Keep firing from above and
 take control of this battle!

rows.label: soul21_C0903
rows.name:
Success! Take aim
 and keep shooting!

rows.label: soul21_C1001
rows.name:
Down they go!
 Strike like the wind!

rows.label: soul21_C1002
rows.name:
Hoo-rah! Now pump 'em full
 of lead while they're down!

rows.label: soul21_C1003
rows.name:
Toppled! Now weaken 'em
 to seal the deal!

rows.label: soul21_C1101
rows.name:
Sucks not being able to move,
 huh? Melee attacks!

rows.label: soul21_C1102
rows.name: You won't miss now. Fire!

rows.label: soul21_C1103
rows.name:
Stunned 'em! Now weaken
 them even more!

rows.label: soul21_C1201
rows.name:
They're asleep! Finish them
 with a melee strike!

rows.label: soul21_C1202
rows.name:
Let's blow some holes
 in this dreamer!

rows.label: soul21_C1203
rows.name:
The enemy's off guard!
 Now send 'em to hell!

rows.label: soul21_C1301
rows.name:
Caught 'em! Now hit 'em
 where it hurts!

rows.label: soul21_C1302
rows.name:
Don't worry about hitting me!
 Just shoot!

rows.label: soul21_C1303
rows.name:
Get in and hit this freak
 so it stops squirming!

rows.label: soul21_C1401
rows.name:
My Doll's slowing down!
 Recovery!

rows.label: soul21_C1402
rows.name:
Move in and give them a
 taste of their own medicine!

rows.label: soul21_C1403
rows.name:
My Doll's a wreck, but we've
 still got plenty of ammo!

rows.label: soul21_C1501
rows.name:
Heal up and stand your
 ground! It's not a total loss!

rows.label: soul21_C1502
rows.name:
Buff me up! I've got a bone
 to pick with that freak!

rows.label: soul21_C1503
rows.name:
If they want to push us, they'll
 get what's coming. Overclock!

rows.label: soul21_C1601
rows.name: Low fuel?! Gimme a boost!

rows.label: soul21_C1602
rows.name: I need a re-up to ride this out!

rows.label: soul21_C1603
rows.name:
We can't afford to lose this
 Doll! Gimme a fix!
